import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './header.styles.scss' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assests/crown.svg' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
SHOP CONTACT {console.log('this is current user in header ', currentUser)} { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : (SIGN IN) }
) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: 'state.user.currentUser' }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
